name: Gareth Thornfield
title: Tavern Keeper
description: A stout, friendly man with a booming voice and infectious laughter. His tavern is always lively, filled with music, drinks, and good cheer.

greeting.first_time: Welcome to the Golden Griffin! Best ale in the kingdom, and the finest entertainment you'll find! I'm Gareth, owner and master of this fine establishment.
greeting.returning: Ah, back again! Always good to see a familiar face. What can I get for you?
greeting.tired: You look exhausted, friend. A good night's rest will set you right.

sleeping.text: *snoring loudly* Zzzzz... *mumbles* ...more ale for table three... Zzzz...

off_duty.text: Just taking a short break before the evening rush! The tavern's open—help yourself to a seat downstairs!

main_menu.text: What brings you to the Griffin today?

rent_room.text: A room for the night? That'll be 50 gold—includes a hot meal and a soft bed. You'll wake up feeling like new!
rent_room.success: Excellent! Your room is upstairs, second door on the right. Sleep well!
rent_room.failure: Ah, you're a bit short on coin. Come back when you have 50 gold.

buy_drink.text: A fine choice! Our ale is brewed locally—smooth and strong, just how adventurers like it. That'll be 5 gold.
buy_drink.failure: Ah, you need 5 gold for a drink.

ask_about_entertainment.text: We have live music every night! If you're a performer yourself, talk to Marcus at the door—he handles all the bookings. We pay well for quality entertainment!

goodbye.text: Safe travels, friend! Come back anytime!
